value.description: Content to the right of the title

disabled.description: Whether the panel can be opened or collapsed
disabled.description_zh: 面板是否可以打开或收起

isLink.description: Whether to show the arrow on the right and turn on click feedback
isLink.description_zh: 是否展示右侧箭头并开启点击反馈

clickable.description: Whether to turn on click feedback

border.description: Whether to display the inner border

name.description: If the unique identifier is not set, the index value of the current collapse-item is used by default
name.description_zh: 唯一标识符，如不设置，默认用当前collapse-item的索引值

icon.description: The image to the left of the header, which can be an absolute path image or a built-in icon
icon.description_zh: 标题左侧图片，可为绝对路径的图片或内置图标

duration.description: The transition time for the panel to be folded and collapsed, in ms
duration.description_zh: 面板展开收起的过渡时间，单位ms

slots.name: default
slots.description: Collapse the contents of the panel

slots.name: title
slots.description: The title of the collapsed panel

slots.name: icon
slots.description: Customize the icon in front of the title
